summary: Beautiful body replacer, all credits to natilde.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a body that i took from natilde's bosmer mod
Here is the link to his mod, all credits to him
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25971/?

For me there is no better body than this, it's beautiful and simple, UNP based, so you can use it with any UNP armor/clothing.

I didn't created anything. I just wanted to share it with the community, and simplify the job for people who just want the body.

The pictures are in weigh 0 and 100

Also recommend to use it with ECE and Univision Face for UNP
Here are the links to them.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14569/?

Natilde gave his permission to everyone to mess with his mods, since he is not working on skyrim modding anymore. I am also aware natilde made that body based on others, so if you are the owner of one of these mods, PLEASE contact me, and i will put your name into the credits, or delete it if that's the case.
author: PhexDrage
